channel.title: Posts on stella koh
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on stella koh

item.title: How to install Geppaku theme
item.description: Geppaku is bluish white theme for Hugo. It is color name in Japan. Chinese character is “月白”. 月白（げっぱく）とは、月の光を思わせる薄い青みを含んだ白色のことです。 via http://irocore.com/geppaku/ Geppaku is the white color including a thin blue that reminiscent of the light of the moon. (If that translate is wrong, please inform me using PullRequest.) Screenshot Index page (http://www.podsnack.com/musicstellak/a1jsdaqq) Post page Audio page Installation $ mkdir themes $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/masa0221/hugo-theme-geppaku hugo-theme-geppaku See the Hugo documentation for more information.
